definition: to give oneself wholly to/to put oneself at sb's service/(of a woman) to give one's body to/to marry
surname Wei
same as 逶 in 逶迤 winding, curved
to entrust/to cast aside/to shift (blame etc)/to accumulate/roundabout/winding/dejected/listless/committee member/council/end/actually/certainly
body/life/oneself/personally/one's morality and conduct/the main part of a structure or body/pregnant/classifier for sets of clothes: suit, twinset/Kangxi radical 158

sentences.english: The fear of the Lord, which is the beginning of wisdom, consists in a complete devotion to God.
sentences.chinese: 敬畏耶和华是智慧的开端，是在于完全委身于神。

sentences.english: God often calls surrendered people to do battle on his behalf.
sentences.chinese: 神常常呼召向他委身的人为他打仗。

sentences.english: It can stir us to decision and devotion.
sentences.chinese: 音乐可以激发我们决志和向神委身。

sentences.english: In your own words you affirm your commitment to God's five purposes for your life.
sentences.chinese: 用你自己的话，誓言对神给你的五个人生目的的委身。

sentences.english: For summer and his pleasures wait on thee.
sentences.chinese: 只因夏之欢愉既已委身于你。

sentences.english: Fath actually means surrender and commitment to the claims of Christ.
sentences.chinese: 信仰的意思其实就是向基督的声明降服与委身。

sentences.english: The difference between being a church attender and a church member is commitment.
sentences.chinese: 参加教会和成为会员的分别在于有没有委身。

sentences.english: I can let you have He De committed to me.
sentences.chinese: 我有何德何能让你委身于我。

definition: willingly
(of a woman) to marry a man of lower social status/to marry down
willingly and gladly (idiom)
to betroth a girl (in arranged marriages)
to deign/to condescend/to yield to (entreaties)/to submit to (sb)/(polite) to deign to accept (a post)
to rely on sb for protection
to condescend/to deign
to prostitute oneself/to sell oneself into slavery
to capitulate
to be willing to/to resign oneself to
to abandon
to bear humiliation to save one's skin (idiom)
humble/lowly
to entrust
to meet with misfortune/to fall into dire straits
to drift and live without purpose (idiom); to drag out an ignoble existence
